mapper.select: SELECT S.* , C.* , C.CODE_NM AS WORK_TYPE_NM FROM WTM_FLEXIBLE_STD_MGR S JOIN WTM_CODE C ON C.ENTER_CD = S.ENTER_CD AND C.TENANT_ID = S.TENANT_ID AND C.GRP_CODE_CD = 'WORK_TYPE_CD' AND S.WORK_TYPE_CD = C.CODE_CD WHERE S.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND S.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND #{d} BETWEEN S.USE_SYMD AND S.USE_EYMD
